pages.text: $(li)The Iron Horse Armor is the upgrade of the Leather Horse Armor that you can give to your tamed Horse.$(br)$(li)You can craft this armor with a Leather Horse Armor and Iron Ingots in a Crafting Table.
$(li)While you have the Iron Horse Armor on your hand, just right click on your tamed Horse, then place the Iron Horse Armor in the Armor slot.$(br)$(li)Insert a picture equipping an armor
